message.body: Do you have the bin of 3" screws at yr place?
Yeah, u can take all three bins of screws. I'm tired of bringing them up and down my basement stairs over and over

Talked to Bobby's office, we have an extension and they'll mail us the stuff as soon as they can. Waiting to hear back from Andy but we'll need to pay him soon. I can pay you today. Can I add the $100 I owe you for Marcie's and then subtract the $300 for Andy?
Can you get an oven on a credit card?
